Articles.Content: I can't exit the science center when I get into it, I have tons of mods but I wounder if it could be the conflicting module managers I have from all my mods dating back to ksp 2.0

...it could be the conflicting module managers I have from all my mods dating back to ksp 2.0

This statement frightens me.

It's probably not just Module Manager, but I'd bet you have several other mods that are incompatible with KSP 0.25. Please read the How to Get Support (READ FIRST) sticky and provide all the requested information.

Fair warning, the advice may well be to remove mods one at a time until you resolve the issue.
Doyou have DebRefund? That mod gave me that problem in 0.25.
